rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language ('will not enter the food system') and a Q5 Preparedness/Confidence cue ('has the strongest AI surveillance program').
The segment states birds will not enter the food system and describes surveillance efforts, lacking a moderate verb + scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a positive fact ('will not enter the food system') and reports actions/capabilities ('strongest AI surveillance program') but lacks explicit calming language about public safety.
